title: Set Variable Block
body:
Set Variable Block¶

The Set Variable block allows you to mark a specific point in the workflow.
A contact who reaches a set variable will retain this variable - now a token of the contact - as they move through the workflow.
This memory allows for more complex if/then blocks to be implemented later on in the workflow.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the workflow design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Set Variable block in your workflow where desired

  2. Enter a name

  3. Enter a value

  4. Click Done
